description.value:
While Vexbalg are common in major cities, there are many villages and towns where Vex are treated with fear and suspicion. You might have been born into such a community, possibly never even knowing another Vex. As a hidden Vexbalg, you have crafted a single identity that you consider to be your true face. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Impersonate checks to pretend you are of the ancestry which you were raised as. In addition, you gain the adopted ancestry feat for that ancestry.

While you gain a circumstance bonus to pretend you are of an ancestry, this does not apply to deception checks you make while you are pretending to be someone specific of that ancestry. For instance, a human guard might be unable to see that you are not human and are a shapeshifted Vexbalg, but might still be able to see that you are not the guard you are pretending to be.
